src:
Klasemen Liga 1 Usai Persipura Bungkam Madura United
03 Nov 2019, 21:06 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi Persipura Jayapura. (ANTARA FOTO/Suwandy)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Klasemen sementara Liga 1 2019 mengalami perubahan setelah Persipura Jayapura mengalahkan Madura United 2-0 di Stadion Gelora Ratu Pamelingan, Pamekasan, Minggu (3/11).Persipura meraih tiga poin berkat dua gol yang dijaringkan Muhammad Tahir pada menit ketiga dan Titus Bonai (74'). Di masa injury time babak kedua, Madura United malah harus bermain dengan 10 orang karena Marckho Meraudje diganjar kartu merah.Hasil positif ini membuat Persipura berhasil meraih empat kemenangan dari lima laga terakhir. Tim Mutiara Hitam pun naik ke peringkat ketiga klasemen sementara.Persipura berhasil mengoleksi 43 poin dari 24 pertandingan. Skuat asuhan Jacksen F. Tiago menggeser Borneo FC yang sebelumnya menempati posisi tersebut.


Ilustrasi Madura United di Liga 1 2019. (ANTARA FOTO/Saiful Bahri)

Persipura yang menghuni peringkat ketiga hanya berjarak satu poin dari Madura United. Laskar Sapeh Kerrab gagal menjauhkan jarak poin dari Persipura usai menelan hasil negatif di hadapan publik sendiri.Pergeseran posisi juga terjadi di zona papan bawah. Persija Jakarta naik ke peringkat ke-14 usai mengalahkan PS Tira Persikabo pada Minggu sore.



Persija mengamankan tiga poin berkat dua gol yang seluruhnya tercipta di babak kedua. Dua gol tuan rumah lahir lewat sundulan kepala pemain impor, Xandao dan Marko Simic.Persija saat ini mengoleksi 27 poin dari 24 laga. Tim Macan Kemayoran unggul tiga poin dari Persela Lamongan yang menempati batas akhir zona degradasi.Sementara itu, kekalahan dari Persija membuat Tira Persikabo masih tertahan di papan tengah. Tira Persikabo menduduki posisi ketujuh dengan 37 poin.Klasemen sementara Liga 1 2019Tim                       Poin1. Bali United         552. Madura United   443. Persipura           434. Borneo FC         415. PSS                  396. Arema               387. Tira Persikabo    378. Persib               349. PSM                  3310. Bhayangkara    3211. Persebaya        3112. Barito              2913. PSIS                2814. Persija              2715. Badak Lampung 2616. Persela              2417. Kalteng Putra     2318. Semen Padang   23 (jal)
text:
League 1 Standings After Persipura Mute Madura United
03 Nov 2019, 21:06 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration of Jayapura Persipura. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Suwandy)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The 2019 league standings changed after Persipura Jayapura defeated Madura United 2-0 at Ratu Pamelingan Stadium, Pamekasan, Sunday (3/11). Persipura won three points thanks to two goals scored by Muhammad Tahir in minutes third and Titus Bonai (74 '). During the second half injury time, Madura United instead had to play with 10 men because Marckho Meraudje was given a red card. This positive result made Persipura won four of the last five matches. Mutiara Hitam team also rose to third place in the standings. Persipura managed to collect 43 points from 24 matches. Jacksen F. Tiago's squad shifts Borneo FC, which previously occupied that position.


Illustration of Madura United in League 1 2019. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Saiful Bahri)

Persipura who inhabit third place is only one point away from Madura United. Laskar Sapeh Kerrab failed to keep the distance points from Persipura after swallowing negative results in front of the public itself. Shifting positions also occurred in the lower board zone. Persija Jakarta rose to 14th place after defeating PS Tira Persikabo on Sunday afternoon.



Persija secured three points thanks to two goals that were all created in the second half. Two goals the host was born through the header of import players, Xandao and Marko Simic. Perija currently has collected 27 points from 24 matches. The Kemayoran Tigers are three points ahead of Persela Lamongan who occupy the deadline of the relegation zone. Meanwhile, the defeat of Persija makes Tira Persikabo still stuck in the middle of the board. Tira Persikabo occupies the seventh position with 37 points. League 201 201 temporary standings Team Points 1. Bali United 552. Madura United 443. Persipura 434. Borneo FC 415. PSS 396. Arema 387. Tira Persikabo 378. Persib 349. PSM 3310. Bhayangkara 3211. Persebaya 3112. Barito 2913. PSIS 2814. Persija 2715. Badak Lampung 2616. Persela 2417. Kalteng Putra 2318. Semen Padang 23 (jal)
